PerfectNetExp.abs: nutgall 五倍子nuthatch 五子雀nuthook 警察
2010年10月1日 -  ①五十雀(Nuthatch),又名五子雀,能在树上倒着移动,是世界上唯一能低头活动的鸟类。 ②福克斯广播公司(FOX),公司总部在洛杉矶,是当今美国四大广播.
Studies on Growth and Development of Eurasian Nuthatch Nestlings普通鳾雏鸟的生长发育研究

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from nut + obsolete hatch (related to hack), from the bird's habit of hacking with the beak at nuts wedged in a crevice

means.word_mean: 1. any of various small short-tailed sharp-beaked birds that creep on trees and feed on small nuts and insects

auth_sentence.content: It might have been that but it might also have been a nuthatch calling.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It might have been that but it might also have been a nuthatch calling.
